content: {"text": "@danperegrine @niccruzpatane In Ontario, the best case residential electricity rate is under the Ultra-Low Overnight plan: 2.8¢/kWh from 11pm-7am (effective Nov 2024-Oct 2025). Delivery adds variable costs (e.g., ~2.6¢/kWh in Toronto) and fixed ~$45/month.
